participant_1.name: Lila Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Lila is outgoing and loves sharing her experiences through songwriting.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

participant_2.name: Mark Thompson
participant_2.personality: Mark is determined and disciplined, shaped by his military upbringing. He values camaraderie and enjoys exploring new cultures through food.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.
